byline: Your ultimate guide to conquering the week-long server event

cards.title: Event Format
cards.content: KvK has two stages: 5 Days of Preparation and 1 War Day. Your server earns points during Preparation, but true victory is decided by capturing the Throne on War Day.

cards.title: Victory Conditions
cards.content: The server that controls the Throne for a total of 2 hours on War Day wins KvK. If no server reaches 2 hours, whoever holds the Throne at the end wins.

cards.title: Preparation Stage
cards.content: During Preparation, players complete daily task themes (Construction, Research, Rally, Hero, Training) to earn points for their server. The server with the most points becomes the Invader.

cards.title: Server Matching
cards.content: Servers are matched based on overall strength. Matchups are announced before Preparation begins, allowing time for planning and coordination.

cards.title: Cross-Server Transfers
cards.content: On War Day, a special button appears in the event page. Players can transfer between servers up to 3 times per day to invade or defend. Use transfers wisely to maximize your impact.

cards.title: Map and Throne Battle
cards.content: Strategically capture nearby towers to control the battlefield. Coordinate guild assaults on the Throne early. Healing wounded troops quickly and reinforcing allies are critical to success.

tabs.title: Construction Day
tabs.description: Today is about maximizing your event points by upgrading buildings for Facility Power gains, using speedups efficiently, and spending resources.
howToScore: üèõÔ∏è Power Increase: The amount of Facility Power gained when completing an upgrade is the main way to score.
‚è≥ Speedups Used: Every minute of speedup used earns points, regardless of type (1m, 5m, 1h, etc.).
ü™µ Resources Spent: Wood, Stone, and Rubies used toward upgrades grant minor points.
preparationStrategy: ‚úÖ Finish major building upgrades **before** Construction Day begins, but **do not pop the gold chest bubble**.
‚úÖ At event start, pop all queued upgrade bubbles for instant points.
‚úÖ Upgrade multiple important buildings and line them up to be ready for popping as soon as possible.
smartUpgradePlaybook: ‚úÖ Always wait for **full Guild Help** before using speedups to reduce upgrade time by ~20%.
‚úÖ Use available queues (1‚Äì4) efficiently ‚Äî always have something upgrading if possible.
‚úÖ Prioritize upgrades that provide the highest Facility Power per speedup minute.
‚úÖ Speedup use should be smart: short and long upgrades are fine as long as the power return is high.
‚úÖ Focus on clearing bubbles during Construction Day only ‚Äî bubbles popped outside the day **will not score**.

do: Finish high-power upgrades before reset and pop bubbles after event starts.
Prioritize Castle and key military buildings for the best point yield.
Wait for maximum Guild Help before spending speedups.
dont: Pop upgrade bubbles too early or before the Construction Day window.
Use speedups on low-value upgrades like Farms, Mines, Tavern, or Blacksmith.
Leave upgrade queues idle without preparing new buildings.

tabs.metaTip: Players who prep Castle upgrades and other high-power buildings days or weeks before can instantly top rankings at event start by popping bubbles strategically.

tabs.title: Research
tabs.description: Complete tech upgrades in your Research Lab to earn points.
tips: Prioritize high-point techs (Military > Economy > Growth).
Use Research Speedups or General Speedups.
Begin long techs before reset to complete during event.
Watch for research buffs in the Alliance Tech.

tabs.title: Rally
tabs.description: Run alliance rallies, defeat world bosses, and upgrade Lord Gear.
tips: Use every Rally Ticket (they recharge hourly).
Coordinate with alliance for constant rallies‚Äîespecially active zones.
Upgrade Lord Gear before reset to maximize points.
Use challenge bosses as bonus score farming.

tabs.title: Hero
tabs.description: Enhance your top heroes to score. Levels, skills, stars, and gear all count.
tips: Save EXP items and Fragments for this day.
Enhance gear on heroes actively used in Arena or Rally.
Skill upgrades and star ascensions grant bonus points.
Focus on SSR+ or SSS+ heroes for higher point yields.

tabs.title: Training
tabs.description: Train new troops across all tiers‚Äîhigher tiers score more.
tips: Train T4 troops if possible (highest points per unit).
Use training boosts from Alliance Tech or Guild Buffs.
Start training queues the night before and speed finish post-reset.
Don‚Äôt forget to claim troop training event rewards too.

tabs.title: War
tabs.description: Portals open! Invade or defend your throne zone. PvP begins.
tips: Reinforce allied towers and guildmates under attack.
Use healing speedups generously‚Äîpoints are lost when wounded.
Capture towers near the Throne to prevent enemy movement.
Group attack key buildings‚ÄîThrone, Gates, and Barracks.
Avoid solo porting; move in packs with support.

tabs.title: Settlement
tabs.description: Healing, assisting, and post-war cleanup. Green potions boost alliance healing.
tips: Use all remaining healing potions to assist alliance mates.
Finish wounded troops before server reset for ranking.
Thank active guildies and discuss War Day reflections.
Start preparing for the next event cycle (clear queues, stock up).

cards.title: üì¶ Preload Upgrades Smartly
cards.content: Complete building upgrades early but DO NOT pop the gold chest bubbles. Pop them on Construction Day for maximum points.

cards.title: üï∞Ô∏è Maximize Guild Help
cards.content: Always wait for full Guild Help before using speedups. This saves about 20% of construction, research, or healing time for free.

cards.title: ‚öîÔ∏è Stick Together on War Day
cards.content: Move as groups when invading. Never solo port onto enemy territory. Focus on controlling towers near the Throne with your guild.

cards.title: üõ°Ô∏è Prioritize Healing Speed
cards.content: Use healing speedups aggressively. Wounded troops can't fight or score points, and losing armies weakens your server‚Äôs defense.

cards.title: üéØ Plan Your Transfers
cards.content: You only get 3 cross-server transfers per day. Plan them around major tower fights or Throne pushes, not random PvP.

cards.title: üöÄ Early Prep = Late Win
cards.content: Start stacking speedups, resource packs, and troop training before KvK starts. Winning War Day starts weeks in advance with preparation.
